title: ANNOYING FAKE RIOT ADVERTISING

embed.description: Together with Riot we are launching Christmas RP giveaway promo for this summer. $10, $25 or $50 RP card can be yours now!

body:
has anyone come across the bloody promo? seems legit with riot logos and stuff just wasted a good 30 mins on this crap. Riot why you letting this shit happen? can you offer compensation for the time i wasted.
someone tell me im not the only one{{item:3070}}
